item.title: 希腊的橄榄油危机足以引诱盗贼
item.description: 千百年来，橄榄一直是一种低压力作物，但希腊的情况表明，气候变化使收获的可预测性大大降低，种植地区也更加绝望。【原文：Olives were a low-stress crop for millennia, but Greece shows how climate change has made the harvest much less predictable—and growing regions more desperate.】

item.title: 奇货可居：制造蜜蜂和虾疫苗的生物技术公司（播客）
item.description: 提起生物技术公司，大多数人都会联想到试图为人类疾病找到治疗方法的企业。而对于试图为动物、昆虫甚至......甲壳类动物提供同样治疗方法的公司，人们的讨论并不多。然而，健康的动物是生态系统的重要组成部分，对我们的食品供应非常重要。在本期节目中，我们将采访达兰动物保健公司的首席执行官安妮特-克莱泽（Annette Kleiser）。【原文：Think of a biotech company and most people will think of a business trying to come up with cures and treatments for human illnesses. There’s not a lot of discussion about companies trying to do the same for animals, insects, or even... crustaceans. And yet, healthy animals are a key part of the ecosystem and important for our food supply. In this episode, we speak to Annette Kleiser, CEO of Dalan Animal Health, which has developed the world’s first vaccine for bees and is now working on a simila】

item.title: 欧盟将根据 2040 年目标开放进口碳信用额度

item.title: 无计划扩张仍然不是解决之道
item.description:
